dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8622 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 123 South 3rd Street in King City, California, as the “Chief Rudy Banuelos Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Panetta (for himself, Mr. Huffman, Mr. Garamendi, Ms. Matsui, Mr. Obernolte, Mr. McNerney, Mr. Harder of California, Ms. Lee of California, Mr. Costa, Mr. Khanna, Ms. Eshoo, Ms. Lofgren, Mr. Carbajal, Mr. Garcia of California, Ms. Brownley, Ms. Chu, Mr. Schiff, Mr. Cárdenas, Mr. Sherman, Mrs. Napolitano, Mr. Lieu, Mr. Gomez, Mrs. Torres of California, Mr. Ruiz, Ms. Sánchez, Mr. Takano, Mr. Calvert, Ms. Porter, Mr. Lowenthal, Mr. Peters, Ms. Jacobs of California, and Mr. McClintock) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 123 South 3rd Street in King City, California, as the Chief Rudy Banuelos Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 123 South 3rd Street in King City, California, shall be known and designated as the Chief Rudy Banuelos Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Chief Rudy Banuelos Post Office.
